full_output.summary: Dedicated and results-oriented Computer Science student with a solid foundation in programming languages like C/C++, Python and Java. Eager to apply academic knowledge and gain practical experience in software development. Strong problem-solving skills, quick learner, and effective team player with a passion for technology and innovation.

projects.name: Breast Cancer Detection using CNN
projects.description: Developed a breast cancer detection system using AlexNet, ResNet-50, VGG16, and VGG19. Implemented image pre-processing techniques and transfer learning to enhance model accuracy. Achieved high accuracy in image classification through rigorous training and evaluation. Evaluated models using metrics such as accuracy, precision, recall, and F1-score.

projects.name: Fake News Detection System
projects.description: Developed a fake news detection system using logistic regression and Naive Bayes algorithms. Collected and preprocessed textual data for training and testing models. Achieved high accuracy in distinguishing between genuine and fake news articles. Analyzed model performance with evaluation metrics such as precision, recall, and F1-score.

projects.name: Gas Leaking Detection System using Arduino
projects.description: Developed a gas leakage detection system using Arduino and MQ2 gas sensor. Implemented real-time detection of gas leaks, triggering a buzzer to warn users. Designed and coded the system focused on enhancing safety measures and preventing potential hazards.

full_output.name: Kapil Garg
